data.title: David Vickers
data.meta_description: David Vickers is a fictional character from the American soap opera One Life to Live, portrayed by Tuc Watkins.
data.text:
American fictional character / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

For the hotel chain founder, see Intown Suites.

David Vickers is a fictional character from the American soap opera One Life to Live, portrayed by Tuc Watkins.
